comments:
jars = org.eclipse.wst.sse.ui_1.0.101.v200606191900.jar,
       org.eclipse.wst.xml.ui_1.0.100.v200606141450.jar.

To reproduce:
1. Create a new XML file. File - New - Other - XML - XML.
2. Choose "create an XML file from scratch".
3. Place the caret in the first line.
4. Choose menu item Source - Toggle Comment. Exception occurs.
